ingredients.ingredient: 1 large carrot, sliced diagonally into 1/4 inch thick slices
1 (5 ounce) can tuna packed in water, drained

cookingTips: Slice carrots diagonally to create a larger surface area for the tuna topping
Blanch or lightly steam carrot slices for 3-4 minutes to soften them slightly while keeping them crisp
Mix tuna with green onions and mayonnaise; spoon onto carrot slices just before serving to prevent sogginess
enrichment.coachingPrompt: These bites are a healthy appetizer combining protein and vegetables. How could you make them more interesting with additional seasonings?
